titleStmt.title: Christ the head of civil government A sermon preach'd Novemb. 13. 1699, and now made publick, at the desire of the Societies for Reformation of Manners, in London and Westminster. By Joshua Oldfield, V.D.M.
titleStmt.author: Oldfield, Joshua, 1656-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by K. Astwood, for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside, near Mercers-Chappel,

notesStmt.note: With a half-title: A sermon by Mr. Oldfield for the Reformation of Manners.
With five final pages of advertisements.
Running title: A sermon for the Reformation of Manners.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
